CodeplexIssue.Title: Download is not working
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml: I was only able to download it from: https://github.com/CaioProiete/NetOffice-NuGet Please fix the download, it freeze at around 29MB, then timeout.

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: hey man![0A][0A]i support the NO downloads from codeplex only.[0A]first timer i ever heard from NetOffice on github (WTF?)[0A]you can download NetOffice from various websites but[0A]these downloads are not official in exception of codeplex.[0A] [0A]A generaly hint: Use when ever you can the original downloads from the[0A]contributer/manufactor. Its more safety. (Use a search engine to find the real contributor)[0A][0A]*Sebastian[0A][0A]
